Celebrating National Cat Day

A Swifties analysis of  Taylors Version



Photo Credit Erin Boren

Looking for a convenient closetocampus bar with a great happy hour One has just moved into the neighborhood PERIOD Bar Louie recently opened its second location just a fiveminute drive from campus at La Cantera PERIOD

Bar Louies atmosphere is classy yet simple PERIOD Its an easy place to stop by after work or school or head to for a night out The staff is laid back but extremely attentive  good service considering during primetime Bar Louie is bustling with people and humming loudly with music PERIOD

Bar Louies happy hour runs from  to  p.m PERIOD weekdays and is full of great finds including  drafts  wines and halfprice appetizers PERIOD The draft selection of  common varieties is not as full as Bar Louies neighbor Yard House but still contains a good selection PERIOD

Many of the halfprice appetizers can double as an entre especially the Boneless Wings which come with a sauce choice PERIOD Go with the buffalo sauce for a delicious somewhat spicy experience PERIOD

The Cheese Quesadillas with chicken is another tasty selection PERIOD What appears to be a simple quesadilla explodes with flavor when it hits your tongue PERIOD Its multiple cheeses melt together to create something no one would be able to replicate PERIOD

The Bruschetta Pomodoro with shrimp is also a good steal at halfprice and is creatively served in an oversized martini glass PERIOD

They also offer halfprice flatbreads and  martinis during happy hour PERIOD The large selection of martinis has something for everyone PERIOD The Effen Good is the most requested of the martini list with its refreshing mix of Effen Cucumber Vodka agave nectar mint and lime PERIOD

The Ramblin Rose martini offers a fruity martini without the fruit juice feel PERIOD Its light in flavor and without a strong alcohol kick PERIOD Its distinctive ingredient  egg whites  gives it a nice frothy texture.The highly recommended Tickled Pink martini offers another take on interesting textures with orange juice pulp and cranberry and peach flavors PERIOD

The Diva pineapple martini and Strawberry Peach Bellini martini are good for a lighter onenote taste while The Fizz martini has a lightly sweet citrus overtone with floral undertones PERIOD The Fizz is a good standard goto martini with a twist PERIOD

Every drink comes with a garnish such as raspberries or a pineapple slice but the most creative and outrageous garnish comes with the Bloody Mary PERIOD The Ultimate Bloody Louie comes not only with a celery stick but also a lemon and lime wedge an olive a slice of cheese Italian meat and a pickle PERIOD

As a good snack or accompaniment to an entre make sure to try the Truffle Butter Popcorn an exciting take on an original PERIOD It comes smothered in truffle butter parsley and parmesan cheese PERIOD

Bar Louie is a great addition to La Cantera and has already acquired a good number of regulars PERIOD Its a goto anytime hangout in a great location for UTSA students and faculty with an extremely fun atmosphere PERIOD

Bar Louie also offers  burgers on Tuesdays and an additional happy hour Sunday through Thursday from  to  p.m PERIOD They are open every day from  a.m PERIOD to  a.m PERIOD For more information or to download the Bar Louie app visit barlouieamerica.com PERIOD The original San Antonio Bar Louie can be found at Stone Oak PERIOD

Independent Student Newspaper for the University of Texas at San Antonio
title: Bar Louie: Happy Hour Heaven - The Paisano
name: University of Texas San Antonio
